Name: Heather Julep
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. CHURN (stir) the drink using a bar spoon. Top the glass with more crushed ice so as to fill it and churn again. Serve with straws.
Review: A Scotch whiskey twist on the classic bourbon-based Mint Julep .
History: Adapted from a recipe discovered in 2001 at Teatro, London, England.
